=== About me ===
I am an <nowiki>[[http://www.dit.hua.gr/index.php?lang=en|Information Technology]]</nowiki> student and Ubuntu, GNOME and Openoffice contributor since 2008 when I did my <nowiki>[[http://git.gnome.org/browse/brasero/commit/?id=1226fba61e9246a336c7bf8a02b72b3662a1fb37|first translation to Greek (Brasero)]]</nowiki>. Since 2009 I've been developing FOSS software and helping other Ubuntu Greek LoCo members. Lately I am helping Greek schools to use and have a better experience with Ubuntu.

=== Contributions ===
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-gr.org/|Ubuntu Greek LoCo]]</nowiki> member since 2008.
* Ubuntu, GNOME and Openoffice translator (to Greek) since 2008.
* Developer of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/cpug|cpu-g]]</nowiki> - ''a hardware information tool'' (<nowiki>[[http://gtk-apps.org/CONTENT/content-pre1/113796-1.png|Screenshot]]</nowiki>), which was my first Python/GTK+ project.
* Developer of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/epoptes|Epoptes]]</nowiki> - ''a computer lab management and monitoring tool'' (<nowiki>[[http://www.epoptes.org/_/rsrc/1329950201600/about/epoptes.png|Screenshot]]</nowiki>), which has become a pre-installed application in Edubuntu.
* Developer of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/sch-scripts|sch-scripts]]</nowiki> - ''a user administration tool designed for Greek schools'' (<nowiki>[[http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8068/screencj.png|Dialog Screenshot]]</nowiki>).
* #ubuntu-gr Greek LoCo IRC channel operator since 2009.

=== Future Goals ===
I want to make even more schools/organizations use Ubuntu and Epoptes by developing nice and powerful features in Epoptes (such as teacher/student screen multicasting, internet blocking, CLI) and develop other useful open source software.
